name: The Faith Healer
description:
You will receive a small sketch of the Virgin Mary, a picture of the cross, and a drawing of the healing hand.

Generalized malaise $20.00
Price varies depending on sickness, $5.00 for a cold $500 for cancer (that's a bargain!)
Free Shipping on purchases over $50

To receive it you've gotta lay down and be quiet.

Just put your hand on the healing hand and voila! Sleep with the image of the Virgin Mary under your pillow for 1 month and the cross tucked into your wallet.

disclaimer:
if you don't get better, it's not our fault

Specify what needs to be healed when purchasing, we treat things like gaseyness and bloating, bleeding extra.

***Purchase as a gift- shock someone with a healing hand!

Your belief and $20 bucks will get you well!

name: What thing are you?
description:
We know.
Send a pic of yourself.
You will receive 1 drawing of you as we feel you are in the world of things.

We take you past your physical self and thing you.
